name: Abyss Scarab
description: Area contains an additional Abyss

name: Abyss Scarab of Edifice
description:
Abysses in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths lead to a Stygian Spire
Abyss pits in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths or spawn an Abyssal Trove will spawn Minor Stygian Spires

name: Abyss Scarab of Multitudes
description: Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters

name: Abyss Scarab of Profound Depth
description:
Monsters from Abysses in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for
each prior Pit in that Abyss

name: Ambush Scarab
description: Area contains 3 additional Strongboxes

name: Ambush Scarab of Containment
description:
Area contains many additional Strongboxes
Area's inhabitants are lying in ambush

name: Ambush Scarab of Discernment
description: Strongboxes in Area are more likely to be rarer varieties

name: Ambush Scarab of Hidden Compartments
description: 15% Chance for Strongboxes in Area to be openable again

name: Ambush Scarab of Potency
description: 75% Increased effect of Explicit Modifiers on Strongboxes in Area

name: Anarchy Scarab
description: Area contains 4 additional Rogue Exiles

name: Anarchy Scarab of Gigantification
description: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 30% chance to be replaced with a Rogue Giant

name: Anarchy Scarab of Partnership
description: Wild Rogue Exiles in Area have a 50% chance to appear in pairs

name: Bestiary Scarab
description: Area contains Einhar

name: Bestiary Scarab of Duplicating
description: Create a copy of Beasts captured in Area

name: Bestiary Scarab of the Herd
description: Area contains 5 additional Red Beasts if it contains Einhar

name: Betrayal Scarab
description: Area contains Jun

name: Betrayal Scarab of Reinforcements
description: Immortal Syndicate Members in Area have 50% increased chance to be accompanied by reinforcements

name: Betrayal Scarab of the Allflame
description: 75% Increased number of Monster Packs Substituted by Allflame Embers in Area

name: Beyond Scarab
description: Slaying enemies close together in Area can attract monsters from Beyond this realm

name: Beyond Scarab of Haemophilia
description:
Beyond Portals in Area have 50% increased Merging Radius
Characters that Kill Beyond Rare Monsters in Area have a 30% chance to gain their Modifiers for 20 seconds

name: Beyond Scarab of Resurgence
description:
Beyond Bosses in Area are enraged on low life
Beyond Bosses in Area drop 100% increased Tainted Currency
Beyond Portals in Area have 30% increased chance to spawn a Unique Boss

name: Beyond Scarab of the Invasion
description: Rare and Unique Monsters slain in Area create 8 to 12 additional Beyond Portals

name: Blight Scarab
description: Area contains a Blight Encounter

name: Blight Scarab of Blooming
description:
Blight Encounters in Area have up to 3 additional Unique Bosses
Unique enemies in Blight Encounters have 100% increased life
Tier 14+ Blighted Maps found in Area drop as Blight-Ravaged Maps instead

name: Blight Scarab of Invigoration
description:
Each Empowering Tower in Areas grants Blighted Monsters in
range increased Difficulty and Reward

name: Blight Scarab of the Blightheart
description:
Blight Encounters in Area have one Blighted Chest
Blight Encounters in Area spawn many more waves of Enemies
Blighted Chests in Area grow larger and more
rewarding the more Blighted Enemies are slain

name: Breach Scarab
description: Area contains 2 additional Breaches

name: Breach Scarab of Lordship
description: Breaches in Area each contain a Breachlord

name: Breach Scarab of Resonant Cascade
description:
Breaches in Areas open and close 10% faster for each Breach already opened
Monsters from Breaches in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for
each Breach already opened

name: Breach Scarab of Snares
description:
Breaches in Area have 3 to 5 additional Clasped Hands
Clasped Hands in Area are guarded by a rare Breach Monster

name: Breach Scarab of Splintering
description:
Breach Monsters in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters
Clasped Hands in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters

name: Cartography Scarab of Corruption
description: Non-Unique Maps found in Area are Corrupted with 8 Modifiers

name: Cartography Scarab of Escalation
description: 10% increased Maps found in Area for each Map Modifier affecting Area

name: Cartography Scarab of Risk
description: Area has 2 additional random Modifiers

name: Cartography Scarab of the Multitude
description:
Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of
Difficult and Rewarding Monsters which drop 300% increased Maps

name: Delirium Scarab
description: Area contains a Mirror of Delirium

name: Delirium Scarab of Delusions
description: Maps found in Area have layers of Delirium

name: Delirium Scarab of Mania
description:
Delirium Reward Meters fill 100% faster in Area
Delirium in Area increases 50% faster with distance from the mirror

name: Delirium Scarab of Neuroses
description:
Delirium Encounters in Area contain all Unique Delirium Bosses
Can only be used with Tier 11+ Maps

name: Delirium Scarab of Paranoia
description: Delirium Encounters in Area generate 2 additional Reward types

name: Divination Scarab of Pilfering
description:
Divination Cards which drop in Area are stolen by a Final Map Boss
That Final Map Boss becomes more Difficult and deals
increased Damage the more Divination Cards they have stolen
That Final Map Boss duplicates all stolen Divination Cards when defeated

name: Divination Scarab of Plenty
description:
Area contains 6 to 10 additional Packs of Divination Touched Magic Monsters that
have 1000% increased chance to drop Divination Cards

name: Divination Scarab of The Cloister
description:
Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Doedre's Devoted
Doedre's Devoted have 1% additional chance to drop a Stacked Deck

name: Domination Scarab
description: Area contains 2 additional Shrines

name: Domination Scarab of Apparitions
description: Area contains 2 additional Apparition Shrines

name: Domination Scarab of Evolution
description: Area contains an additional Evolving Shrine

name: Domination Scarab of Terrors
description:
Shrines in Area are guarded by an Atlas Boss
Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

name: Essence Scarab
description: Area contains 2 additional Imprisoned Monsters

name: Essence Scarab of Adaptation
description:
Imprisoned Monsters released in Areas grant a random Essence Modifier to another Imprisoned Monster in the Area
Imprisoned Monsters in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for
each Essence Modifier

name: Essence Scarab of Ascent
description: Essences found in Area are a tier higher

name: Essence Scarab of Calcification
description: Rare monsters that are natural inhabitants of the Area are imprisoned by Essences

name: Essence Scarab of Stability
description:
Corrupting an Essence in Area can only result in
upgrading or transforming Essences

name: Expedition Scarab
description: Area contains an Expedition Encounter

name: Expedition Scarab of Archaeology
description: Remnants in Expedition Encounters in Area have 2 additional Suffixes and Prefixes

name: Expedition Scarab of Runefinding
description:
Expedition Encounters in Area have 100% increased
number of Runic Monster Markers

name: Expedition Scarab of Verisium Powder
description:
Expedition Encounters in Area have 50% increased number of Explosives
80% increased Explosive Radius

name: Harbinger Scarab
description: Area contains 3 additional Harbingers

name: Harbinger Scarab of Obelisks
description:
Harbingers in Area spawn Empowered Obelisks
Empowered Obelisks drop Currency Shards when defeated

name: Harbinger Scarab of Regency
description: Harbingers in Area have a 50% chance to be replaced by a powerful Harbinger Boss

name: Harbinger Scarab of Warhoards
description: Currency shards dropped by Harbingers in Area are duplicated

name: Harvest Scarab
description: Area contains the Sacred Grove

name: Harvest Scarab of Cornucopia
description: If Area contains the Sacred Grove, it will contain up to 1 additional Tier 4 seed of each type, if possible

name: Harvest Scarab of Doubling
description:
Lifeforce dropped by Harvest Monsters in Area is duplicated
Harvest Monsters in Area have 100% more Life

name: Horned Scarab of Awakening
description: You can select one Imbued crafting option on the Map Device

name: Horned Scarab of Bloodlines
description:
Area has 150% increased Magic Monsters
Magic Monsters in area have an additional Modifier

name: Horned Scarab of Glittering
description:
Players in Area gain increased Item Rarity for each Monster
slain, up to 400%, decaying over time

name: Horned Scarab of Nemeses
description: Rare Monsters in Area have 2 additional Modifiers

name: Horned Scarab of Pandemonium
description:
Monster packs in Area have a 15% chance to be replaced by a random Atlas Boss
Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

name: Horned Scarab of Preservation
description: Other Scarabs are not consumed on use

name: Horned Scarab of Tradition
description:
All Rare and Unique Monsters in Area have dropped items
transformed by a Reward Modifier

name: Incursion Scarab
description: Area contains Alva

name: Incursion Scarab of Champions
description:
Incursions in Area have a 35% chance for all Monsters to be at least Magic
Incursions in Area have 15% increased Pack Size

name: Incursion Scarab of Invasion
description: Area contains 12 to 16 additional packs of Incursion Monsters

name: Incursion Scarab of Timelines
description:
Final Architect slain in Area will drop an Itemised Temple
Itemised Temples dropped in Area are generated based on current Temple layout, but with randomised room tiers

name: Influencing Scarab of Conversion
description: Tier 14+ Maps found in Area have a chance to drop as Shaper Guardian, Elder Guardian, Conqueror or Unique Synthesised Maps instead

name: Influencing Scarab of Hordes
description: Influenced Monster Packs in Area have 40% increased Pack Size

name: Influencing Scarab of the Elder
description: Adds Elder Influence outcome to Area

name: Influencing Scarab of the Shaper
description: Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Area

name: Kalguuran Scarab
description: Area contains an additional Ore Deposit

name: Kalguuran Scarab of Guarded Riches
description: Monsters guarding Ore Deposits in Area are at least Magic

name: Kalguuran Scarab of Refinement
description: Ore Deposits in Area grant Smelted Bars instead of Marking Ore

name: Legion Scarab
description: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter

name: Legion Scarab of Command
description: Legion Factions in Area are accompanied by a General

name: Legion Scarab of Eternal Conflict
description:
Legion Monsters in Area can be broken out of Stasis multiple times
Legion Monsters in Area gain increased Difficulty and Reward for each time they are broken out

name: Legion Scarab of Officers
description: Legion Factions in Area have 5 additional Sergeants

name: Ritual Scarab of Abundance
description: Rituals in Area offer 100% increased Favours

name: Ritual Scarab of Selectiveness
description:
Rerolling Favours at Ritual Altars in Area has no cost the first 2 times
Ritual Altars in Area allow rerolling Favours 1 additional time

name: Ritual Scarab of Wisps
description:
Ritual Altars in Area spawn a Wildwood Wisp
Wildwood Wisps grant 100% increased Tribute Gained to nearby Players

name: Scarab of Adversaries
description: Area contains 4 additional Packs with Mirrored Rare Monsters

name: Scarab of Bisection
description: You can select the Nullify Prefixes or Nullify Suffixes crafting options on the Map Device

name: Scarab of Divinity
description:
Up to 3 additional Rare Monsters in Area will be Pantheon-Touched
Apparitions spawned by Pantheon-Touched Monsters deal 100% increased damage

name: Scarab of Hunted Traitors
description: Area contains Hunted Traitors

name: Scarab of Monstrous Lineage
description: 40% increased Magic Pack Size

name: Scarab of Radiant Storms
description: Area contains a Resplendent Tempest

name: Scarab of Stability
description: Portals to Area have a 50% chance to not be consumed on use

name: Scarab of Wisps
description: Monsters in Area have a chance to be Empowered by 2000 Wildwood Wisps

name: Sulphite Scarab
description:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 150% more Sulphite

name: Sulphite Scarab of Fumes
description:
Sulphite found in Map Area releases Enraging Fumes
Monsters affected by Enraging Fumes have 50% increased Item Quantity
Sulphite in your maps is guarded by Monsters from the Azurite Mine

name: Titanic Scarab
description: Unique Monsters have 1% increased Toughness, Damage, Rarity and Quantity of items dropped per 1% increased Pack Size of Area

name: Titanic Scarab of Legend
description: Unique Monsters in Area have 4 additional Monster Modifiers

name: Titanic Scarab of Treasures
description:
Unique Monsters in Area have an additional Reward
Unique Monsters in Area have 30% increased Toughness

name: Torment Scarab
description:
Area is haunted by 3 additional Tormented Spirits
Tormented Spirits in Area have a 50% chance to
be set free when Possessed Monsters are slain

name: Torment Scarab of Peculiarity
description: Tormented Spirits in Area are replaced with unusual variants

name: Torment Scarab of Possession
description: Rare Monsters in Area have a quarter chance to be Possessed by up to 3 Tormented Spirits

name: Ultimatum Scarab
description: Area contains an Ultimatum Encounter

name: Ultimatum Scarab of Bribing
description:
Ultimatum Monsters grant 150% increased Experience
Ultimatum Encounters grant rewards as though you completed 2 additional Rounds

name: Ultimatum Scarab of Catalysing
description:
Ultimatum Encounters in Area will only offer Catalysts
as Rewards to the Map Owner

name: Ultimatum Scarab of Dueling
description: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will always lead to a Unique Boss if possible

name: Ultimatum Scarab of Inscription
description:
Ultimatum Encounter rewards in Area offering Catalysts
will offer Inscribed Ultimatums to the Map Owner instead
